name: Tree
description: Large woody plant with a single trunk and elevated leafy crown.

name: Shrub
description: Multi-stemmed woody plant shorter than trees, dense branching.

name: Bush
description: Compact, rounded shrub with thick foliage.

name: Dwarf Shrub
description: Very low woody plant under one meter tall.

name: Woody Cushion
description: Dense, dome-shaped woody plant adapted to alpine winds.

name: Vine
description: Flexible stem climbing plant using tendrils or twining.

name: Liana
description: Woody climbing vine reaching canopy by other supports.

name: Creeper
description: Low plant spreading across ground or walls.

name: Climber
description: Plant ascending supports without woody stiffening.

name: Groundcover
description: Low, spreading plants forming continuous carpet.

name: Mat-forming Plant
description: Tight interwoven stems forming flat mats.

name: Cushion Plant
description: Compact hemispherical plant insulating against cold.

name: Prostrate Plant
description: Branches lie flat along ground before tips rise.

name: Ascending Plant
description: Stems initially horizontal then curve upward.

name: Erect Plant
description: Upright growth habit with vertical stems.

name: Herb
description: Non-woody plant dying back after flowering.

name: Forb
description: Broad-leaved herbaceous plant, non-grass.

name: Grass
description: Narrow-leaved monocot forming clumps or turf.

name: Sedge
description: Grasslike plant with triangular stems, moist habitats.

name: Rush
description: Round-stemmed grasslike plant of wetlands.

name: Bamboo
description: Fast-growing woody grass with hollow culms.

name: Arborescent Grass
description: Tree-like grass reaching several meters tall.

name: Cane
description: Tall, stiff jointed stem grass or reed.

name: Succulent
description: Water-storing fleshy stems or leaves.

name: Cactus
description: Spiny succulent adapted to deserts.

name: Aloe-type
description: Rosette succulent with thick sword-shaped leaves.

name: Agave-type
description: Massive rosette succulent flowering once, then dying.

name: Tree Fern
description: Tall trunked fern with crown of fronds.

name: Fern
description: Non-flowering vascular plant with fronds and spores.

name: Horsetail
description: Jointed reed-like spore plant of wetlands.

name: Moss
description: Tiny non-vascular plant forming green cushions.

name: Liverwort
description: Flat or leafy non-vascular plant of moist shade.

name: Lichen
description: Symbiotic fungus-alga forming crusts on rock or bark.

name: Alga
description: Simple aquatic photosynthetic organism.

name: Seaweed
description: Large marine alga forming underwater forests.

name: Epiphyte
description: Plant living upon other plants, not parasitic.

name: Hemiepiphyte
description: Starts life aloft then roots to soil below.

name: Strangler Fig-type
description: Seed germinates aloft, envelops host trunk.

name: Parasitic Plant
description: Derives nutrients directly from other plants.

name: Carnivorous Plant
description: Traps and digests insects for nutrients.

name: Nitrogen Fixer
description: Plant hosting bacteria to enrich soils.

name: Geophyte
description: Seasonal herb with bulbs or corms underground.

name: Rhizomatous Plant
description: Spreads via underground horizontal stems.

name: Stoloniferous Plant
description: Spreads via above-ground runners forming clones.

name: Tuberous Plant
description: Stores starch in swollen underground organs.

name: Rosette Plant
description: Leaves radiate from central point at ground level.

name: Floating Aquatic Plant
description: Free-floating on water surface with dangling roots.

name: Submerged Aquatic Plant
description: Fully underwater except maybe flowers.

name: Emergent Aquatic Plant
description: Roots underwater, stems rise into air.

name: Halophyte
description: Thrives in salty soils or coasts.

name: Xerophyte
description: Adapted to survive extreme drought.

name: Hydrophyte
description: Adapted to saturated or flooded conditions.

name: Helophyte
description: Marsh plant rooted in mud, aerial shoots.

name: Desert Shrub
description: Woody, drought-adapted plant of arid lands.

name: Evergreen Tree
description: Tree retaining green foliage year-round.

name: Deciduous Tree
description: Tree shedding leaves seasonally.

name: Conifer
description: Cone-bearing needle-leaved evergreen tree.

name: Palm
description: Unbranched trunk topped with large frond leaves.

name: Cycad
description: Primitive palm-like gymnosperm with stiff leaflets.

name: Palmoid
description: Thick columnar stem crowned by rosette leaves.

name: Dwarf Conifer
description: Miniature slow-growing cone-bearing shrub or tree.

name: Suckering Plant
description: Sends up new shoots from spreading roots.

name: Clump-forming Plant
description: Multiple stems rising closely from base.

name: Dense Shrub
description: Tightly packed branches forming impenetrable mass.

name: Open Shrub
description: Sparse branching with airy form.

name: Arching Shrub
description: Graceful outward curving cane habit.

name: Columnar Plant
description: Narrow upright pillar-shaped growth.

name: Weeping Plant
description: Branches droop downward gracefully.

name: Mound-forming Plant
description: Hemisphere of foliage, rounded outline.

name: Virgate Plant
description: Wand-like long slender upright shoots.

name: Cushion Dwarf Shrub
description: Low woody dome just above ground.

name: Woody Liana
description: Thick climbing vine with secondary growth.

name: Semi-woody Half-shrub
description: Lower stems woody, upper herbaceous.

name: Annual Herb
description: Completes life cycle in one growing season.

name: Biennial Herb
description: Grows vegetatively first year, flowers second.

name: Perennial Herb
description: Lives multiple years, regrowing each season.

name: Poikilohydric Plant
description: Can survive desiccation; rehydrates when water returns.

name: Green-stemmed Woody Plant
description: Photosynthetic stems replacing leaves in arid sites.

name: Saprophytic Plant
description: Lacks chlorophyll, feeds on decaying matter.

name: Ant Plant
description: Hollow-stemmed plant providing housing to ants.
